numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Group 6 includes Rose Zwettler.
2. Group 6 includes Kate Shepard.
3. Group 6 includes Grace Urban.
4. Group 6 includes Alex Scott.
5. The title is "The Coaching Gap: Underrepresentation in Professional Sports".
6. In each sport-group, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
7. This difference is a representation gap.
8. We wonder why this representation gap exists.
9. Soccer has a low percentage of players of color.
10. Baseball has a low percentage of players of color.
11. Major League Soccer has the highest percentage of head coaches of color.
12. Most data is from 2020.
13. The data for the Women's National Basketball Association is from 2019.
14. We wonder why the data for only one sport-group is from a different year.
15. Five sports are showcased.
16. Only one women's sport is showcased.
17. We wonder why only one women's sport is showcased.
18. In Major League Baseball, managers are counted as head coaches.
19. In other sports, head coaches are counted as head coaches.
20. We wonder why Major League Baseball counts managers and not head coaches.
21. We consider the impact of the data on our community.
22. The data shows that coaches of color are underrepresented in professional sports.
23. This underrepresentation is a major problem in our community.
24. We question what the community can do to lessen this issue.
